channel.title: Venezuela on Noah Mazer
channel.description: Recent content in Venezuela on Noah Mazer

item.title: Miguel James - AGAINST THE POLICE
item.description: [CONTRA LA POLICIA] All of my Work is against the police. If I write a Love poem it’s against the police. And if I sing to the nakedness of bodies I sing against the police. And if I make this Earth a metaphor I make a metaphor against the police. If I talk crazy in this poem I’m talking against the police. And if I manage to create a poem it’s against the police.
